ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ Captain: Unleash it.
Helicopters blast the hair off the poles,
as they speed over the border of Ukraine,
Rotors at MAX rpm, swerving from left
to right, as they carry a heavy load below.
Fastened by carabiners and ropes of steel,
Chinhooks, apaches, jets and more,
guiding the weapon of colossal destruction to
the killing place.
In Kyiv now, and as the red sun starts to set,
beauty for a moment, as each rope falls slack,
a huge shadow casting over each apartment in darkness,
the children hidden in the bunkers draw close to the cracks, in the walls,
to observe as the colossal giant, in wonder
slowly descends with the force of a thousand nukes,
an eir of insatiable tranquility for the few moments before impact, as the
orange sunset light falls behind...
Then a shock wave, throwing them under rubble,
as buildings collapse in the feverish heat of the impact, uprooting every tank and gunner,
a colossal divot forms, ripping and devouring the flesh of the earth,
like EDP taking a bite into daughter nature's cupcake, after luring it into the deceitful wake of his destruction,
and exploding in the centre of the town.
